CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT( Inbound_Gateway__c ) = "SYD", "Sydney", IF( TEXT(Inbound_Gateway__c) = "BNE", "Brisbane", IF( TEXT(Inbound_Gateway__c) = "MEL", "Melbourne", IF( TEXT(Inbound_Gateway__c) = "ADL", "Adelaide", IF( TEXT(Inbound_Gateway__c) = "PER", "Perth","")))))
CustomField.label: Inbound Gateway Name
